prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a stoic, imposing assassin, deep purple skin tone, sharp angular facial features, short dark hair, wearing a textured dark grey/black futuristic trench coat, serious expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, volumetric rim lighting, extreme detail on leather/fabric texture of the coat, subtle biological texture on the purple skin, sharp focus on the face and collar
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, flat color, blurry coat, black blob, low quality, shiny armor
